page.title: 04Farming Around Handsacre
page.content: In the area there are the following farms. Farm Name Size Farmer 1. Marsh Barn 260 Acres Mr.Webster 2. Tuppenhurst 260 Acres Mr.Betson 3. Echill 240 Acres Mr.Prince 4. Bromley Lane 40 Acres Silverwood 5. Rileyhill ? Phillips 6. Pipe Ridware ? Mr.Smith 7. Manor ? Mr.Frogett Number 1-3 sow their seed with a tractor and sprayed to kill leather jacket and crane fly ,sometimes an aeroplane is used. FARM CROP SOWING Marsh Barn Beet,Winter/Spring April Barley Oct. Tuppenhurst Barley/Beet/Sheep April Oct. Echills Rape/Barley/Wheat Oct.
